title: ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set,includes 1 Pack 8 OZ Mini Stubby Claw Hammer and 1 Pack 16 OZ Fiberglass General Purpose Claw Hammer,Soft Nonslip Handle & Heat Treated Head,Heavier for Higher Hardness
descriptions:
Introducing the ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set, the perfect addition to your toolbox for all your hammering and clawing needs. This set includes a Mini Stubby Claw Hammer weighing 8 OZ and a Fiberglass General Purpose Claw Hammer weighing 16 OZ.

The hammer head of these tools is made from high carbon steel, ensuring durability and strength. It is heat treated and polished with a rust-preventative clear coating, providing maximum striking strength and protection against corrosion.

The handle of these hammers is constructed with rubber and TPR coating, offering an ergonomic design for easy handling. The non-slip texture ensures a secure grip, while the fiberglass construction and vibration absorption technology reduce user fatigue.

With glue feed technology, these hammers allow for efficient and precise application of glue. They are designed for driving nails and pulling nails, providing maximum nail-pulling leverage. The narrow and flat head is perfect for striking, while the sharpened and curved claw allows for easy nail pulling.

The ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set is well-balanced, making it comfortable to use for extended periods. The robust design ensures longevity and reliability. These hammers are easy to handle and operate, providing a convenient experience.

Featuring a hang hole for easy storage, these hammers are designed to be practical and efficient. Whether you're a professional contractor or a DIY enthusiast, the ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set is a must-have for any project.
